examples: they had sex in the back seat

definitions.text: either of the two categories (male or female) into which most organisms are divided
all of the feelings resulting from the urge to gratify sexual impulses
examples: he wanted a better sex life
the film contained no sex or violence

definitions.text: the properties that distinguish organisms on the basis of their reproductive roles
examples: she didn't want to know the sex of the foetus
This movie usually arouses the male audience
